abstracts.cdata!:
The Export Rehabilitation Technical
            Assistance Project aims at strengthening the institutional
            capability of the key organizations in the export sector so
            that they can play effective roles in rehabilitation of the
            export industries.  Specifically the project will provide
            about 120 man-years of technical assistance to assist the
            Government in implementing a number of export sector policy
            and institutional reform measures; to carry out related
            sector studies; and to build local capability through staff
            training.  The project also aims at ensuring adequate
            management capacity of the cocoa, timber, gold mining
            organizations and the ports authority to execute the Export
            Rehabilitation Project.
